alert.note: Alert for Elko; Eureka (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 1:10PM PDT until June 06 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Elko County in northeastern Nevada... North central Eureka County in north central Nevada... * Until 145 PM PDT. * At 110 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Valley, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter to half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Valley and Emigrant Mine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
